name: Unstable Machines
description:
Unstable Machines

Made for VimJam2 [8 Bits to Infinity]

Requirement: Boss
Theme: On the Edge

Concept:
The fragile Machines of your Company got thrown off Balance and will get destroyed when they fall.
As Boss of the Company you have to program your robots to get to the Machine to stop the fall.
Both robots have to get to the machine, so they can rebalance the machine together.

Controls:
M - Back to Main Menu
R - Restart Level
Mouse:
Click on top of the puchcards to reveal or hide them.
Click on the holes of the punchcard to program the corresponding robot.
Click the Start Button to start the execution of both programs.

Note:
When playing in browser, I recommend playing in fullscreen.
